column4: hi, is there any way to upload a set of files to multiple ftp servers at the same time?
only with several ftp clients. you could write a script for ncftpput which does this

ah i see, i was trying to write a script that automates ncftp, but it just pauses fater the initial login when promnpted for the username.  do you know how i can write a shell script that can take standard input?

expect I guess. but: you can put the password on the commandline. if you want to that is. or use a scripting language like python/perl/ruby for your script where getting passwords typed in is even easier
